statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT trial_name, status FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT trial_name, patient_id, outcome FROM clinical_trials WHERE status IN ('completed', 'terminated');
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT trial_name, outcome FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND status = 'InProgress';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, status FROM clinical_trials WHERE status IN ('Planned', 'InProgress') ORDER BY trial_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE study_phase = 'Phase 3';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, enrollment_date FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, study_phase FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female'
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE study_phase = 'Phase 3' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients, ClinicalTrials WHERE Patients.patient_id = 3 AND ClinicalTrials.trial_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Patients INNER JOIN ClinicalTrials ON Patients.patient_age = 45
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, sponsor FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT p.patient_name, p.age, c.trial_name, o.outcome_data FROM Patients p JOIN Outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id JOIN ClinicalTrials c ON o.trial_id = c.trial_id WHERE c.sponsor = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT patient_name, gender, COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM Patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, start_date, end_date FROM Patients p JOIN Outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id JOIN ClinicalTrials c ON o.trial_id = c.trial_id ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, trial_name, outcome_data FROM Patients p JOIN Outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id JOIN ClinicalTrials c ON o.trial_id = c.trial_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%tumor%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, trial_id FROM patients ORDER BY date_enrolled DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT patients.patient_name, outcomes.outcome_description FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcomes.outcome_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT trial_name, start_date, sponsor FROM trials WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT medications.medication_name, patients.patient_name, medications.prescription_date FROM medications JOIN patients ON medications.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY medications.prescription_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials ORDER BY trial_name
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM trials WHERE budget > 1000.00 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, description, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost < 500.00 LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_name, address, registration_date FROM patients JOIN patient_trials ON patients.patient_id = patient_trials.patient_id WHERE trial_id = 1;
